head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MODEST, OTTO WILLIAM

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MODEST, OTTO WILLIAM

block.p: MODEST-Otto William. Devoted husband of the late Dorothy (nee Wendell). Beloved father of Rosemarie Antoni, Barbara Eyrich, and Virginia Modest. Loving grandfather of Edward Antoni, Jr., and Christopher Antoni. Reposing at Schuyler Hill Funeral Home, 3535 East Tremont Avenue, Bronx, NY until Friday 10:30 AM. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Frances de Chantal Church, Bronx, NY 11 AM. Interment is at Gate of Heaven Cemetery. Visiting on Thursday from 2-4 and 7-9 P.M.
